caption.p: Changes in atmospheric circulation to CO 2 concentration increases. Difference distribution (121–140 years minus 1–20 years) of ensemble mean of ( a) velocity potential function (colors) and divergent wind (arrow) at 200-hPa level and ( b) effective wind [ V E]. Contours in a indicate ensemble mean field of velocity potential for the first 20 years with intervals of 20 × 10 5 m 2 s −1. Dotted denotes the region where the responses of 14 or more out of the 21 CMIP5 models are of the same sign
